transcript:
Agent: Hello, is this Mr. Johnson?
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Emily, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. We specialize in energy-efficient appliances.
Customer: Okay, what can I do for you?
Agent: We've recently launched a new line of smart thermostats that can help reduce your energy bills by up to 30%.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking to upgrade my thermostat.
Agent: Great! Our thermostats are Wi-Fi enabled, allowing you to control the temperature remotely through our mobile app.
Customer: That's convenient. How much do they cost?
Agent: Our starter package begins at $199, and we're currently offering a 10% discount for first-time customers.
Customer: Okay, that's within my budget. What kind of support do you offer?
Agent: We provide a 2-year warranty and dedicated customer support 24/7.
Customer: That sounds good. Can you tell me more about the installation process?
Agent: Absolutely. We offer professional installation services, or you can choose to install it yourself with our easy-to-follow guide.
Customer: Okay, I think I'm interested. Can you send me a quote and more information?
Agent: I'd be happy to. I'll email you a quote and some additional details. Would you like me to follow up with you next week?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thank you, Emily.
Agent: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
Customer: Likewise, thanks again.
Agent: Have a great day!
